title: Indicating landslide hazard from tree rings – Ecosystem service provided by an alder forest in the hengduan Mts, Sichuan, China
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 67

Author(s): Małgorzata Wistuba, Ireneusz Malik, Yongbo Tie, Elżbieta Gorczyca, Xianzheng Zhang, Jiazhu Wang, Tuo Lu
